headline: Leadership blogs
text: Curt Rice - blog focuses on university leadership, covering subjects ranging from the improvement of research funding to developing policies about open access. Matthew Aston  a personal blog discussing media, politics and ideologies in both Britain and America. If you run a leadership blog and would like it to be featured on the higher education blog network, get in touch via email or Twitter using the hashtag #heblognetwork This content is brought to you by Guardian Professional. To get more articles like this direct to your inbox, become a member of the Higher Education Network.
